mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, sort, path, component, icon, is_show, permission ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{path}, #{component}, #{icon}, #{isShow}, #{permission} )
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, path = #{path}, component = #{component}, icon = #{icon}, is_show = #{isShow}, permission = #{permission} WHERE id = #{id}
DELETE FROM menu WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
